nodes.text: Recycloppers were a species of nonsentient fishes that dwelled in the freshwaters of planet Naboo.

The recylcoppers were spiny, rotund, cyclopean, omnivorous fishes that lived in the freshwaters of Naboo. The Gungans used them as a sort of garbage disposal, as they could eat virtually anything. Recycloppers were often often kept in an aquarium.
